patthana16.76:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.76:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana16.76:1.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.76:2.1_0: Hetuyā cha, sahajāte nissaye kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana16.76:3.1_0: Sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinno dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naanupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.76:4.1_0: Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte nava, kamme cha, atthiyā nava, natthiyā vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
